thread.title: So much for being close to the airport
thread.title_full: So much for being close to the airport - Review of Hampton Inn San Francisco-Airport, South San Francisco, CA - TripAdvisor

author: William N
title: So much for being close to the airport
text: After checking in at the property, I asked the front desk what time airport shuttles departed for the airport in the morning. I was told they started very early. The desk agent then told me the ride took between 20 and 25 minutes because they picked up at several additional hotels. What's the point of staying near the airport if the early morning drive there takes as long as the drive from downtown?
